name: Dope Tycoon Premium - Drug Wars Drug Dealer Simulator
name_original: Dope Tycoon Premium - Drug Wars Drug Dealer Simulator
description:
Classic handheld tycoon business simulator based upon the classic game from yesteryear. Travel from city to city dodging the law, buying and selling whatever you can get for a decent rate.
Can you pay back the notoriously dangerous loan shark, Mr B, before he catches up with you first? You'll have to watch out for Officer H and his donut munching deputies as he will hunt you relentlessly.

Many hidden easter eggs to explore.
